definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (mng. dub.; cf. Nab. n.pr. [[חורו]] Nö in Eut:p. 45)—
LXX Wr, named with Aaron as compan. of Moses Ex 17:10, Ex 17:12, Ex 24:14 (all E).
LXX Wr, a Judahite Ex 31:2 = Ex 35:30, cf. Ex 38:22 (all P) 1Ch 2:19, 1Ch 2:20, 1Ch 2:50 (on div. of verse v. Be VB); also 1Ch 4:1, 1Ch 4:4, 2Ch 1:5.
LXX Our, a king of Midian Nu 31:8, Jos 13:21 (both P).
LXXL Eour (B om.) head of fam. of returned exiles Ne 3:9.
[[בֶּן־חוּר]] officer of Sol. 1Ki 4:8, v. sub [[בֵּן]] p. 122.
